reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Building the capacity of Malaysian law enforcement to tackle corruption

description.narrative: The project is designed to build the capacity of Malaysian law enforcement through the conduct of a training programme that will increase the agencies' knowledge and ability in profiling and evaluating truth and credibility. This will ultimately change perceptions, improve market access and create a ‘levelled playing field' for international businesses, including UK ones, further addressing corruption's detrimental impact particularly on unfair business tendering or the smuggling of contraband, counterfeit goods.
